alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LEWIS AND CENTRAL SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of South Shore, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, Rosemount, Clarktown, Sciotodale, Lucasville, Lombardsville, Saint Paul, Minford, Firebrick, West Portsmouth, Sciotoville, Turkey Creek Lake, Friendship, Mcdermott and Portsmouth Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
